ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Interface CoverView.Callback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioPickerActivity, FullPlaybackActivity, LibraryActivity, MiniPlaybackActivity, PlaybackActivity, SlidingPlaybackActivity
    Enclosing class:
    CoverView

    public static interface CoverView.Callback
    Interface to respond to CoverView motion actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downSwipe()
      Called when the user has swiped down on the view.
      void shiftCurrentSong(int delta)
      Called after the view has scrolled to the previous or next cover.
      void upSwipe()
      Called when the user has swiped up on the view.

    • Method Detail

      • shiftCurrentSong

        void shiftCurrentSong(int delta)
        Called after the view has scrolled to the previous or next cover.
        Parameters:
        delta - -1 for the previous cover, 1 for the next.

      • upSwipe

        void upSwipe()
        Called when the user has swiped up on the view.

      • downSwipe

        void downSwipe()
        Called when the user has swiped down on the view.
